Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More

Click-top closures
Imported



A Very Lucky History

We know that jeans are much more than just denim and grommets; they’re a true blue American icon.

Staying true to the rich heritage — and authentic, all-American spirit — of denim, Lucky Brand began crafting great-fitting, vintage-inspired jeans in Los Angeles in 1990. We gave them their distinctively Lucky look by literally putting them through the wringer — ripping, fraying, sanding, patching and washing by hand — to give them true character and soul. Then, we added authentic hardware, personalized touches and playful details, and an American legend was born.

Read more


Our jeans are made for the free-thinker, the artist, the dreamer; they’re made to dance, work, run, jump, play and rock ‘n’ roll (just like you). Our inspiration doesn’t just come from the rugged workwear of denim pioneers, but from the free spirit and laid-back lifestyle of our Southern California roots. We find inspiration everywhere, from the secluded outlooks of Big Sur, to the old-school tattoo parlors of Venice and the beautiful beaches of Malibu. We reference music, art and photography — old and new — to create truly unique pieces that you’ll wear over and over again.

Read more

High Quality Material: This Women’s Jewellery Set is made of White Gold Plated ,Main stone is Created Blue Sapphire ,Side stone is White cubic zirconia. High Polished. Nickel-free, Hypoallergenic and Shiny Forever. Will not change the color, health and environmental protection.
Adjustable Size: Necklace length: 17.71″+1.97″, Bracelet Length: 7.09″+0.79″,Ring Size :Adjustable . We specially add extension chains for necklaces and bracelets, So that different sizes can be applied, Necklaces and Pendants can be separated, You can change the necklace you like.
Special Occasion Accessories:These wedding jewelry sets are Stunning and Elegant, Suitable for Wedding-Engagement-Party-Ball-Prom-Pageant-Cocktail-Date Night.Come with a nice gift box and a jewelry pouch, It’s a perfect gift for your Lovers, Mother, Daughter, Sister, Wife, Fiancee, Couple, Friends or Yourself on Anniversary-Valentines Day-Birthday-Christmas-Xmas Day.
Protection and Service: Please stay away from chemicals and keep the accessories dry. The product will always stay shiny. If you have any questions about this product, Please feel free to contact us. We will do our best to promise you a wonderful shopping experience.

About LMXXVJ jewelry

Meet you, Meet love.

An amazing encounter, a lifetime companion.

LMXXVJ has been focusing on fashion jewelry accessories, using high-quality cubic zirconia and semi-precious stones and exquisite craftsmanship to make exquisite jewelry. We hope that our jewelry will bring you good luck and a happy life.

All accessories are made of materials that are harmless to the human body to create a comfortable wearing experience for you.

For more earrings, ear clips, necklaces, bracelets, weddings, dance parties, anniversaries, Valentine’s Day jewelry sets, etc., please enter LMXXVJ STORE.

  • Bracelet Physical Picture

  • Pendant Physical Picture

  • Earrings Physical Picture

  • Adjustable Ring Physical Picture

Read more

Electroplating Process

The product uses five-layer electroplating platinum, which can better protect the health of the product and the user.

Bracelet Extension Clasp

All bracelets are equipped with a 0.79″ extension buckle, which can fit different sizes of wrists.

Necklace extension chain

Each necklace and pendant can be disassembled. You can change the necklace yourself, and the necklace adds a 1.97″ extension chain, which is convenient for users to match different clothes.

Read more

  • Every stone, Has every story.

LMXXVJ uses AAAAA grade cubic zirconia. Each stone is polished by experienced craftsmen. Each stone is specially selected to show the perfect cut surface, just to give you the best blessings.

  • Best Birthstone Gifts

Christmas, New Year’s Day, Women’s Day, Mother’s Day, Club Night, Valentine’s Day, Anniversaries, Birthdays, Events, Prom, Cocktail Party, Mitzvah, Prom, Festival, etc. Best for luxury jewelry with wedding dresses, evening gowns and skirts. Best birthstone gifts.

CLASSIC DESIGN: Simple Heart Initial Design ,sparkle and elegant. Lightweight, comfortable for sensitive ears, initial studs earrings are perfect for every day and night wear.
PERFECT GIFTS: Heart earrings give you a comfortable wearing experience. Special gifts for your lover, girlfriend, wife, fiancee, daughter, female friends or just yourself. Perfect gifts for Mother’s day gifts, Valentines day gifts, birthday gifts..

Next page

  1. Pretty and cute hearts are little girls’ favorites, and we made earrings in their shapes to make the girls who wear them happy and beautiful.
  2. The design of the letters gives the earrings a connection with the girls who wear them, and their relationship becomes closer.

  1. Heart initial earrings for teen girls are tiny but outstanding, perfect for everyday to combine with other earrings or wear it alone.
  2. Heart stud earrings has become a trend that leads fashion.
  3. Heart jewelry is not only attractive but also full of youthful atmosphere.

Earrings for Kids Toddler

Babies and toddlers have very sensitive ears, The post of our earrings are made of S925 sterling silver, free of lead and nickel. Safe to daily wear.

Good Choice for Women & Girls

This stud is suitable for all women to wear, simple design, safe material, lovely shape, beautiful color, it deserves to be loved by all women.

Simple Heart Design

A perfect size tiny heart initial earrings, perfect for girls, kids, toddler, baby girl wear.

Come with A Gift Box

Whether its a birthday, holiday, a special occasion, or just because, heart stud earrings is always the perfect gift.

My little girl’s ears are allergic. Can she wear this stud？

Yes, she can. The post is made of sterling silver, is hypoallergenic and won’t harm her ears.

Are these little girl stud earrings? Can adults wear it?

Of course you can, and it’s even better for you. In order to make it safe for little girls to use, so it’s safe. Simple design with love makes this stud suitable for most people.

I don’t like the backs in the picture. Is there any other choice?

Oh, of course, we will include three different pairs of additional backs in the package, so you can choose whichever pair you like.

I can’t find the letters I was looking for, why?

Our products contain all the letters and are available in three different colors, if some of the letters are not on the list, it is because it is out of stock, we will make up for it as soon as possible, you can come back to Anoup after a while.
